Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

HDLSDEVICE

The basic type HDLSDEVICE is a handle to an DLS device.

Discussion

HDLSDEVICE handles are returned from the AIL_DLS_open function.


Group: Basic Types
Related Functions: AIL_DLS_close, AIL_DLS_compact, AIL_DLS_get_info, AIL_DLS_get_reverb, AIL_DLS_load_file, AIL_DLS_load_memory, AIL_DLS_open, AIL_DLS_set_reverb, AIL_DLS_unload, AIL_filter_DLS_attribute, AIL_quick_handles, AIL_set_DLS_processor, AIL_set_filter_DLS_preference
